content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM may transfer your personal data, including any special categories of personal data as necessary, to third parties for the processing purposes set out in section 1.3 as follows:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Within the EPAM Group of Companies\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": As part of our global structure, employee managers or certain regional or global departments may be located at other EPAM group of companies. Therefore, our parent entity in the United States and other EPAM entities within the global EPAM group of companies may receive your personal data such as in order to administer the workforce, monitor and ensure compliance with applicable EPAM procedures, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands. In order to provide adequate protection for such personal data transfers, EPAM implements organizational and technical security measures and data transfers agreements including those based on the EU standard contractual clauses and similar forms deemed adequate by the European Commission and relevant authorities.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With certain third parties\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": Existing or potential business partners, suppliers, independent external advisors (e.g., auditors), banks, insurance carriers, benefits providers, and other third parties may also receive your personal data as necessary in connection with our business operations, in particular to carry out our contractual relationships with such third parties, to administer and provide compensation, administer and provide applicable benefits and other work-related allowances, administer the workforce, comply with applicable laws and employment-related requirements, communicate with employees and third parties, to comply with corporate financial responsibilities, and respond to and comply with requests and legal demands.  We may also share your personal data with regulatory bodies to whom we are obliged or required to disclose information, including the Workplace Relations Commission, Courts and Court-appointed persons. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With our customers\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": If you work on customer projects, we may provide the customer with a description of your education and experience or a copy of your resume, with or without your name, but after removing your personal contact information. You might be asked to participate in interviews with our customer for the purpose of onboarding you on a customer project. Once you have been provisionally selected for a client project and before you can start on the project, there may be a requirement for you to undergo background checks (may include personal data concerning criminal record), which may be carried out by us, or a third party, for us to confirm to the customer that you have successfully passed any required background checks, always subject to applicable law. We may provide the customer with a statement confirming passing of background checks which may include no criminal conviction record. The customer will not receive information regarding your criminal convictions, if any. \\r During your cooperation with the customer, we may share data including but not limited to information about your performance and feedback, as well as fees, work time, work schedule, absences, billing data and fees, and termination of your work on the project.\\r The information is shared on the basis of legitimate interest of EPAM and/or the customer. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With certain acquiring or acquired entities\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": If the EPAM business for which you work is sold or transferred in whole or in part or if EPAM is acquiring and integrating another entity into the EPAM business for which you work (or any similar transaction is being contemplated), your personal data may be transferred to the other entity (e.g., the new employer, potential new employer, the new acquired entity, or potential new acquired entity) prior to the transaction (e.g., during the diligence phase) or after the transaction, subject to any rights provided by applicable law, including jurisdictions where the other entity is located.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With data processors\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": Certain third parties, whether affiliated or unaffiliated, may receive your personal data to process such information under appropriate instructions (\\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Processors\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\") as necessary to support and facilitate the processing purposes, such as third party insurance and benefits providers. The Data Processors will be subject to contractual obligations to implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to safeguard your personal data, and to process your personal data only as instructed and to provide adequate protection to personal data transfers.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cross Border Data Transfers\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal data that we collect from you may be transferred to, and stored at, a destination outside the European Economic Community (\\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EEA\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\").  Due to the global nature of our business, your personal data will be disclosed to Group Companies outside of the EEA, including in particular to the United States. These locations may not provide an adequate level of data protection. We will ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place to protect the transfer of your personal data to these non-EEA countries. In order to transfer your personal data to recipients outside the EEA, we will comply with applicable law and rely on mechanism such as: (i) your consent; (ii) the adoption of European Commission approved standard contractual clauses; or (iii) European Commission adequacy decisions. To obtain more information concerning these safeguards see 'Questions'.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
